content.detailedDescription: Last night, a friend of mine and his daughter as well as myself and my son saw and watched two ufo's around my parents place on the sabana river between duster and lake proctor. we drove up to a lake that my dad built and shone our headlights on the tank. we also started using each a spotlight to look around the lake. after a min or so of looking i noticed four really bright stars reflecting off the water and when i looked up there were two horizontal crafts with lights on either end shining on to the lake. the light made the lake look like daytime for just a second and then they were off. you could tell that the crafts were still there but there was no sound. we shone our spotlights up at them and they flew along the treeline back to the right at an amazing rate of speed. they stayed over there for a bit and then went back to the left of the tank but much further away almost instantly. when they were to the left the two lights turned into three lights making a perfect triangle. we sat and watched them for 30 to 45 minutes as they moved around in the sky. my kid was getting a little freaked out over the situation so we proceded to head to the main entrance of the place. when we got into the open bottom land of the feild we stopped and watched them for another 30 min or so. i called my wife and then called my sister who was at my aunts house between gorman and duster to tell her about what i had seen. she said that her husband had called her less than five minutes ago asking if she had seen the lights in the sky as he was driving from there towards comanche. i called him and we saw the same lights brighten in the distance. a little later 10:00 or 10:15 we saw a jet propelled plane fly into the area and drop 8 to 10 flares and chase the two crafts away. the jet plane made a definate plane sound just after it flew by. as we were closing the gate to leave the two crafts were back poking around. i have never in my 34 years of life seen anything like what we saw last night. i have always been kind of a skeptic but had no reason to not believe other friends and family members storys but had never myself seen anything. my cherry is popped and i now believe that there is somthing flying around up there that we as civilians are not privvy to.  the government knows somthing is up because the attempted to chase them off.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched a ufo move around the sabana river bottom for over an hour after it lit up the tank we were spotlighting.

content.detailedDescription:
While outside on a sunday afternoon, i heard an airplane and looked up.  we live in frisco, texas and on the flight path for dfw international airport.  watching several planes at once, one on approach and two at higher altitudes with contrails, i noticed a very bright light slowly passing from west to east.  first noticed due north at approximately 80 degrees inclination (nearly directly overhead).  the object was not an aircraft as it was moving too slow and did not emit a contrail.  (recommend checking the con altitude for this day, time and location.  this will help determine altitude.  i think it was well above the cons).  the light brightened and then dimmed and brightened again, changing reflectivity.  appeared to be a reflection from the sun on some type of object, similar to aircraft glint, but not quite the same and much brighter.

i called my family outside to look at the object.  the 4 of us tracked it east until it disappeared from sight at 1801 cst.  object was observed for approximately 5 minutes.  using a simmons spotting scope on 60 power a definite object was spotted.  spotting scope was used when the object was well to the east at approximately 30 degree inclination to the east.  the object was somewhat translucent, wavering, with reflective properties.  i was only able to see the object through the scope for about 1 min due to the distance and now getting lower on the horizon and beginning to fade away. my teenage son also saw the object through the scope.

my first words when spotting the object were, "its one of those sky snake ufo's!"  the object appeared to have a spherical center with 5 tentacle like  tubes that flexed out to a flexible tubular ring around the outside.  the entire object wavered and slowly changed shape as if it were blown by the wind.

my thought is that it was some type of weather ballon, but some of the facts did not add up.  personally i've witnessed strange shaped weather balloons while flying in the usaf.  i've seen them pancake, wobble, flatten and once even look like the martian mothership.  i even hit a buzz lightyear mylar ballon at 22,000 feet while flying in mexico.  though the translucent coloring was similar to a weather balloon, there were no ribs, nor payload like most weather balloons.  speed and track was consistent with a weather balloon, but the shape did not make sense.

this object was similar to thy sky snake ufo's i've seen on the internet.  this was basically a saturn type object with 5 spokes reaching out to the ring.  the ring and spokes were tubular and flexed, changing shape somewhat.  the sphere did not change shape.  reflectivity depended upon shape.  the object did appear to slightly disappear and then reappear, but this could be because of distance, coloring, and shape.

my 13 year old younger son stated he saw a very fast moving light moving toward the object and then disappear.  the remainder of the family had looked away for a moment and could not corroborate that particular alleged event.

the object was spotted by my father some 40 miles east of my location, in rockwall.  he was unable to get optics on the object, but definitely saw the bright and then dimming reflectivity from the object.

the object could only be seen to have form while viewing through optics.  definitely structured, reflective object with unique shape and flexible properties.  this sighting falls into the classic definition of a ufo...An unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Snake like with sphere in middle ring around outside connected with 5 tentacles

content.detailedDescription:
The last several nights i have observed and reported on two objects in our night sky. this unusual because useually just one hangs out in our local sky with any regualarity. the first two nights larger of two objects appeared to firing beams of light at a object that was below our visable horizon. i never did see that object, i just assumed there was something or someone to shoot at or why would they be doing this. last two nights both objects have been hanging out in western sky. nothing appears to be going on these two nights. they have not been firing lights at anything at least. not sure why larger of two objects is hanging out, unless they are expecting the other unseen object back for some reason. this lasts from 3 to 4 hours and larger craft leaves about nine pm cst. it can be observed descemding below our visable horizon. while our local sometimes joins it.
dont know whats going on but i will keep an eye on the sky for now and report anything else going on.
content.summary: Large one is chevron shaped, smaller is a spere

content.detailedDescription: I filed a report last night that has garnered some interest online.  because of this i have attached an enhanced image.  the only modifications made were approx 25% increase in exposure and approx 100% increase in both detail and sharpness.
content.summary: Additional pic for report 36226.

content.detailedDescription: Viewed 5 total red lights in the sky over the st. paul como park area. squeezing in a quick smoke break at work and noticed 3 lights as bright as a stop light positioned almost like a single plane, moving ne to sw. two of the three lights seperatly altered course and then seemed to move back into a flight pattern. after a few minutes i had noticed that 2 more red lights were following. i work for a pizza delivery chain and had asked 4 co-workers passing by what their thoughts were and noone was able to fully explain what we were watching. the international airport is near, so we get to see planes at all altitudes. while the red lights were flying over we were able to watch a low flying plane and a crusing altitude plane fly over. myself and two co-workers watched in a clear night sky as one by one each flying light instantly changed course. they appeared to turn almost straight out to space and slightly nw at a very quick speed. a plane at about 30,000 feet moving west across the sky, lights flashing in a distance but clearing moving around the earth was passing during this time. each red light grew smaller quickly untell the dissipeared into space. there were sounds from the low flying plane passing by however no sounds produced by the red lights.
content.summary: Viewed 5 red lights in the sky over the st. paul como park area.

content.detailedDescription: Around eight red orange lights seen in the southeast direction of san antonio in the sky: 2 on top of each other and the rest evenly spaced when stationary. lights changed direction then stationary again. then they all moved at the same time slowly towards the south. lights all became bright when stationary then became real dim when moving south. we lost visability due to houses. no sound or anything. there was also a small plane in the sky on west side of us but at a higher altitude. all was seen from the southside near downtown san antonio. seen march 3, 2012 around 9:15pm. i put march 3 2011 for date because the report wouldn't allow me to put exact date.
content.summary: Around eight red, orange, pink lights: 2 on top of each other and the rest evenly spaced out.

content.detailedDescription: I have never reported this before but always looked for pictures similar and never have found.  i along with my mother, who passed away 1998, saw an odd black shape,  during a bright mostly clear day about 5 pm 1976, at least our vision of the item was not obstructed by clouds etc.  we both saw the shape defined below at a lower altitude then raise directly overhead until object was out of site.  the item appeared black in color.  the center of the object was shaped similar to a cigar however there were two intersecting black lines.  best way to describe for shape description.  draw a 2 inch cigar shape.. then move in 1/2 inch from each side and center a 1 inch cigar shape crossing he center, or may i say perpendicular to the center line.  i use the 2 inch description because that is the size it appeared in the sky.  i estimate this item to have been about 2000 feet up (i base this altitude estimate on my current perception of my past memory from 1976 and my skydiving experiences in the mid 90's when i was fairly good at estimating height of clouds).  i do not take any drugs then or now, and never abuse alchohal.
content.summary: Draw a 2 inch cigar shape.. then move in 1/2 inch from each side and center a 1 inch cigar shape crossing he center, or may i say perpendicular to the center line.

content.detailedDescription:
I also saw flashing lights as reported by someone else on 03-03-12 in virginia. location: central va. i didn't report them at first because i wasn't sure how to describe them, but today i saw the video, "most groundbreaking ufos of february 2012" online and saw the exact same thing as the video, "strobe lights over australia." 

there was one very bright light. i am an amateur astronomer, so i will describe the light as brighter than venus when at its brightest (the only known sky object brighter than venus is the moon). it was south-southwest in the sky and stationary. as i stared at it, two very bright lights suddenly flashed a bit to the right of the stationary one. the flashes were very bright and very quick, almost like a camera flash. they flashed, then invisible, flashed again, then all 3 disappeared completely. they didn't move off, they just vanished.
content.summary: Objects flashed very brightly a couple of times and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i took 5 piutures in area of sun. i just reported. i sent in three, but left one that had the yellow mass anomaly out. you may incorporate these two reports and pictures together if you wish. i don.T think these are lense flares? g.A. from whittier
content.summary: Foun yellow mass in front of sun's corona on left side near telephone wires

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i took 5 piutures in area of sun. i just reported. i sent in three, but left one that had the yellow mass anomaly out. you may incorporate these two reports and pictures together if you wish. i don.T think these are lense flares? g.A. from whittier
content.summary: Foun yellow mass in front of sun's corona on left side near telephone wires

content.detailedDescription: Hi,  while taking chemtrail shots, i also take sun pictures. this time caught a yellow mass in the left area of telephone wires near 9:00 o'clock position of sun's corona. taken at 5:28 pst all three sequential pix from a run. there were 5 in sequence. took the three that had mass plus void , plus mass again in sequential order. i didn't think these were caused by sun flare. perhaps a filter can enhance this anomaly. reporting all unknowns? g.A. from whittier. please comment?
content.summary: Yellow cloud like mass near left side of sun's  corona

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my girlfriend were walking my elderly brother home, as it was past midnight (he only lives about 3 hundred yards from my house)on a beautiful frosty, starlit night. just as we were about ten yards from my brothers front gate i happened to look up and immediately noticed two star like objects, side by side, travelling at great speed.Within a split second the one object shot directly in front of the other, so quickly that i was`nt sure if it was the object on the left,or the one on the right.Within another second or so they were back side by side then as they were starting to go away from us they did another manoeuvre.At precisely the same moment the object on the left moved away in an arc to the left, and the other one moved in an arc to the right. as they were disappearing into the distance i could see them move back towards each other before i lost them in the glow of the street lamp on the far side of the road.As soon as i had seen them i pointed and shouted to my brother and girlfriend to look, but unfortunately they were unable to see them, partly due to the speed of the objects, and partly due to the fact that my girlfriend and brother have`nt got the best eyesight without wearing glasses.I am sure the objects were not jets (at least not any that i am aware of) as there was no sound,no vapour trail and no cloud cover. i had the distinct feeling that whoever or whatever were operating them were out for a "joyride", almost as if they were saying "look what we can do". i was totally in awe of what i saw, and almost felt privileged to have witnessed the event. i confess to having an interest in the possibility of ufo`s as i know of four people who have had ufo sightings but you have to have doubts, that is until you see something like i did, then you may think differently.I did a little calculation, based on the approximate angle above the horizon that i first and last saw them,the amount of time i observed them (about 6 seconds)and different possible heights ie, one kilometre, two kilometres etc.If my calculations are correct then i estimate that at an altitude of one kilometre they were travelling at about 1,620 kilometres an hour. i only calculated up to a possible height of four kilometres but at that height i estimate they were reaching speeds of around 6,600 kph or eleven kilometres in six seconds!. they could have been even higher,if so the mind boggles at what speed they were hitting.
content.summary: Two objects, moving at amazing speed, totally silent, changing position in relation to each other.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright blue flashes (flashed twice like lightning) lit up the barrow sky. viewed out my window but i only seen the whole sky light up.
facebook posts:
another witness said it was blue with orange sparkles as it zoomed above barrow towards wainwright. people wondering what it was and were talking about it on their vhf's in wainwright (village about 60 miles west of barrow).
another witness seen 2 planes flying north of barrow during the same time.
another person said he thought someone was taking pictures outside, turned out the whole sky lit up and seen the flashes on the houses and snow/ground all around.
content.summary: Bright blue flashes

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on hwy 80 out of gladewater toward the town of white oak.  passing across a bridge that divides gladewater/clarksville city and white oak right next to lake divernia(spell check). my wife and i noticed a bright white light in the rear view mirror of my vehicle, thought it was an aircraft of some sort.  as we crossed the bridge on divernia, just prior to beginning a hill to come into the city of white oak, the light went from what seemed like miles away to over my vehicle.  it resembled a helicopter spotlight and was directly on my vehicle.  thinking it was some form of law enforcement, we pulled the vehicle over and rolled my window down. it hovered right above the tree line and just over my vehicle..50-100 feet above the vehicle as a guess. i stuck my head out of the window and looked up and was absolutely blinded by the light. my wife was screaming at me to stay in the car and just go.  i remember her telling me j***** just go...Go go go. i used my thumb to block out the brightest light and noticed 4 white lights, north/south/east/west on the craft.  i opened the door to my vehicle and stepped out.  standing as if you were to be looking at an object in the sky during the day, shielding my eyes with the back of my right hand, right hand palm facing the object.  it felt somewhat like warm sunlight.  no burning sensation, just a warm feeling.  im not sure how long i was standing outside the vehicle...And this is where i begin to feel like i am going crazy.  i remember getting out of the vehicle, i remember being in total shock and awe at the site of this craft and then i remember what seems to be a snap back like from a daydream and a huge amount of fear set in.  i was telling myself, "get back in the car and go".  at this time i looked over the roof of the car and noticed my wife doing the exact same thing i was doing.  i yelled at her and she did the exact same motion i did.  almost as if you're concentrating on something and begin to daydream.  someone says your name and you snap back and she literally said "huh".  i told her to get in the vehicle with me and we then left the scene.  the object returned to the same area we initially saw it and was then gone.  i feel like i am a crazy person.  i know what i saw...I am of perfect mental health and have no issues with seeing little green men or even believe in aliens.  infact i want to believe this may be something of ours.  i know beyond a shadow of a doubt it was no helicopter and last i checked, no plane in east texas is able to hover.  it made no noise minus a small electrical discharge sound..The same form of a "hum" that you'd hear from a transformer on an electrical pole.  please, please help me understand what this could have been and help me find someone that can make sense of this.  i am scared..Excited..Worried and thrilled at the same time.  i cant believe something like this has happened to my wife and myself.  we had what seemed to be minor sunburns on our face and the palm of our hands were red.  no blisters or scars/marks.  just a light red/sunburn tinge to our face, neck, palms.  mufon is the only avenue i have found to go to.  please, we need your help.

sincerely,
   j

p.S. i have had a gentleman contact me twice about the purchase of my vehicle.  he's seen me twice now at a gas station once and a shopping mall the 2nd.  i drive a 2001 saturn l200....It's nothing flashy and nothing special at all.  i am unsure as to why this man has talked to me twice yet wont give me any information of his.  he only asks for contact information for me so he can call to question if i've considered his offer for the vehicle.  said his name was jeff thomas if this helps at all.
content.summary: Round, oval like object, 4 exterior white lights with huge white central light

content.detailedDescription:
my friends and i were standing in the front yard and we looked up and
  there was this ufo right above our heads, it made no sound and did not
  move. it had colored lights going around it,my friends father was in the
  in the same front yard of the house, we started yelling for him to look
  at what we were seeing but he never heard us, he was only about 15 feet
  from us. to this day i dont remember seeing it leave or us talking about it.It really scard one of my friends,i was like in a trance i could not believe what i was seeing! this thing was so close it looked like we could just reach up and touch it, it was beautiful!! i have been looking in the sky ever sense.
content.summary: It was salcer shaped with rotating rectangal color lights going around it.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the freeway when this white like that looked like a star hoovering just under cloud cover. then it suddenly shot across in a straight line about half a mile then without slowing down it shot directly straight up into the clouds. this happened in a matter of 2 seconds. the way it moved defies the laws of physics. it was an exciting yet scary experience.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White star like object under clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
21:50 friday feb 3, 2012- driving north on  hwy us1  i saw 8 or 9  yellow/orange orbs in the night sky. at first i thought they were sodium /low intensity lights, like street lights. but i noticed they were moving across the sky. i looked to my left and saw many more coming . they were silently moving from east to west very smoothly. the weren���t in any type of formation- a few here, one here, another couple here and so on.  they flew over head at approximately 1500-ft ( just a guess)  traveling at  maybe 100mph. they were slow enough i could find them in my cameras view finder and track them. they flew over the indian river and then out to sea. they were strung out in a trail that took maybe 4-5 minutes to all pass by.

there were 2 0r 3 people across the street that saw this too.
content.summary: Many orange orbs flew overhead slowly and silently

content.detailedDescription: Will submit statement upon request.
content.summary: Saw ufos over laguna niguel

content.detailedDescription: At home in hot tub looking up at orion's belt then lights appeared out of the blackness at least 10 lights flying circling each other, then forming standard airplane like formations then circling each other again. they had pulsating lights that followed same sequences and brightness pattern i alerted friend who saw them too, then after five min. they left then returned then left, a total of 3 known times
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: An airiel display of flying figure 8's and in various formations such as a v

content.detailedDescription: At home in hot tub looking up at orion's belt then lights appeared out of the blackness at least 10 lights flying circling each other, then forming standard airplane like formations then circling each other again. they had pulsating lights that followed same sequences and brightness pattern i alerted friend who saw them too, then after five min. they left then returned then left, a total of 3 known times
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: An airiel display of flying figure 8's and in various formations such as a v

content.detailedDescription:
At 9pm saw lights north of hwy377 and cr 279 at our angle we could see a dark outline of the craft which was large and circular in shape, it was smaller than the one we watch for 20 min. back 3 years ago, 10 min later saw light toward dublin texas. lots of jets with strob light flashing in a spread out formation wing to wing followed 5 min later like they were searching for something. same as last time but quicker and more of them.
i seemed like alot of private planes were in the area also this time.
we actually saw the craft this time. probably a government plasma test.
content.summary: Dark in shap and circular, it actually resimbaled the picture at the top of this page unlike last time about 3 years ago.

content.detailedDescription:
In the early morning hours of march 3nd 2012 i was sitting in my living room watching a movie and enjoying my first day of vacation.  other than the television the house was completely dark.  my sofa faces east with three large windows to the south, and a large sliding glass door to the north leading to my backyard, as well as a 3 x 3 kitchen window also on the north wall of my home.

around 330am i noticed an intense burst of blue light that flashed once very quickly which caught my eye.  then only a second or two later i saw the light even more intense this time and it sustained for 4 or 5 seconds. a few more quick flashes and that was it.  also, i did not hear a hum but the floor seemed to be vibrating at a low frequency.  

i tried to pass this off as lightening as we were having an intense snow storm but i could not in light of the following:  
i grew up in pensacola florida and there we have some of the most intense lightning storms on the planet.   i have never in my 34 years seen a blue flash of lightning that seemed to be focused in such a small area.  i think its worth noting to say i did not see the light through my front windows as you normally would during a flash of lightning. 

something else i thought was strange:
i have a red lab named winston.  he is 14 months old and has never barked, not one time.... until last night.  during the sustained flash he barked intensly for 10 or 15 seconds.  he paced by the back door for several minutes.  

i believe god put us on this earth.  i also believe in this vast universe there has to be intelligent life.  i am a christian and a professional and would appreciate my name being dissmissed from this report.  i would be glad to answer any questions you may have.
content.summary: Strange pulses of blue light

content.detailedDescription: Noticed two very bright lights in the distance in the southwest region of the sky over i-195. these lights appeared brighter than any star or airplane. (this area has heavy commercial airline traffic) did not have any features to indicate it was a air plain (running lights/headlights/etc.)the objects seemed to pulsate and slowly become dimmer or brighter. observed object through binoculars and noticed it was white to light green on top and had a purple hue on the bottom. at one point several small blinking lights discharged from the area around the brightest light, moved away from it, and then faded out. witnessed a similar event in this very spot and orientation about two years ago after driving home and seeing what i thought was a comet streaking down from the sky.
content.summary: Two glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching television.
it was bright and caught my eye out the window, i thought it might have been a reflection from the tv but stood up and it was still there, i went to get my camera in my mobile phone and when i looked bacck up it was gone. iv seen shooting stars and some meteors but this was like a green bunsen burner flame flying through the sky.
content.summary: Bright ball with green flame behind it. very fast

content.detailedDescription: Looking out of window and seen a massive green ball of light with green trail.
content.summary: Falling ball of bright green light

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home on friday evening, march 2, 2012. between 7 and 7:30pm i took my three small dogs out to the backyard. i immediately noticed a very bright object that i thought was a star. but when it moved i realized it wasn't a star. it appeared to have about three to five lights. it moved back and forth in a zig zag way, and then hovered and wobbled. i began to think perhaps i was just dizzy and maybe i wasn't actually seeing what i thought i was seeing.  i asked my 18 yr old daughter to come out and look at it. she said it was not a star, it was definitely moving and hovering and was not an airplane. she said it must be a ufo. as time went on it moved further north, would zig zab a bit and then hover and wobble some more.  it was very cold out and my daughter was recovering from a bad cold so she went back in.  i came out about every 15 minutes and watched it. then i decided to see if i could get a better look through binoculars. i sat in a lawn chair and once i got it into focus, i kept my hands very steady.  i got quite a good look. it was a spherical object with many lights on it.  the lights were in a grid pattern. the object was a dull metallic color. i realized that what i thought had only been about three to five lights was really many more, at least 15 to 20.

from the time i first saw it, it must have been between 2 1/2 to 3 hours that i could still see it.  at about 10pm it was still visible and had moved north toward ventura county.  at 11pm it was gone.

i regret that i didn't take video or was unable to get a closeup photo through the binoculars. 

i live about 10 miles from the pacific ocean.  from where i live, the object appeared to be following the coastline north.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighting of bright spherical object in northern los angeles county

content.detailedDescription: While going on the patio to smoke a ciggarette, me and my sister noticed two flashing lights that we thought were maybe airplanes but never moved, all of a sudden they both dissapeared right before our eyes and then we saw flashes in other parts of the sky, but only this time the star-like objects were moving and at the same time dissapearing. i've witnessed this activity days following as well with others.
content.summary: Flashing lights in the sky that resemble stars

content.detailedDescription: Driving in the city in miami on mach 1, 2012, at approximately 3:30 pm est when i drove past a bus bench and noticed an individual looking up. so turning my head to gaze outside of my driver side window i spotted what the individual was apparently looking at:  the described object.
content.summary: Hovering, slightly shape shifting, silvery object
